issue.title: [CF 188] Updating ButtonFacade fake tellmewhen :/
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: Attaching a saved variables file/screenshot will increase the likelihood of your problem being solved.
Saved variables can be found in: "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<Account Name>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua"

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Install last version of buttonFacade
2. Tellmewhen won't work :(
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

Do you have an error log of what happened?

Message: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2135: attempt to index local 'tbl' (a nil value)
Time: 05/03/11 07:35:03
Count: 1
Stack: [C]: ?
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2135: in function `Icon_Update'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1549: in function `Group_Update'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:813: in function `Update'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2509: in function `LockToggle'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2519: in function `?'
...AddOns\Bagnon\libs\AceConsole-3.0\AceConsole-3.0.lua:94: in function `value'
Interface\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:4242: in function `ChatEdit_ParseText'
Interface\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:3832: in function `ChatEdit_SendText'
Interface\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:3870: in function `ChatEdit_OnEnterPressed'
[string "*:OnEnterPressed"]:1: in function <[string "*:OnEnterPressed"]:1>
[C]: ?

Please provide any additional information below.


> Posted by CurseForge user Adam77 | Imported from CurseForge issue #188 | Raw

comments.body:
It seems that ButtonFacade is now called Masque, and has been change quite a bit. I will look into it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
